title: UK energy costs likely to halve by 2050, says system operator
description: Modelling by independent body Neso forecasts sharp fall in expenditure from 10% of GDP as shift to renewables continues
content: Modelling by independent body Neso forecasts sharp fall in expenditure from 10% of GDP as shift to renewables continues
